import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List facilities parts"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/parts-facilities"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a paginated list of parts specifically for facilities management. Supports custom filtering and paging via the `SupportsCustomFilters` attribute.

**Workflow Example**
1. [GET /api/v1.0/parts-facilities](/docs/api/parts/list-facilities-parts) to load the first page of facilities parts.
2. Use returned `Items[].PartId` to fetch details via [GET /api/v1.0/parts/\{PartId\}](/docs/api/parts/get-part-by-id).
3. Use [POST /api/v1.0/parts/search](/docs/api/parts/search-parts) for keyword or field-based filters.

**Minimal Required Fields**: None (uses default pagination).

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
